alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Clay; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Downpours with strong wind gusts will impact portions of Nicholas, southwestern Braxton, Clay and north central Fayette Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking downpours with strong wind gusts near Pratt, or 17 miles southeast of Charleston, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Summersville, Sutton, Clay, Ansted, Gassaway, Gauley Bridge, Hawks Nest State Park, Birch River, Craigsville, Big Otter, Wallback, Harrison, Muddlety, Swiss, Indore, Little Birch, Drennan, Ivydale, Widen and Frametown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 near mile marker 34, and between mile markers 36 and 64. Route 19 between mile markers 37 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Clay; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas
